publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8183 Jim Tolson: Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society—That the Parliament congratulates Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society on their successful joint bid to the Postcode Lottery Dream Fund for £65,000 for an edible gardening project; notes that this is a community-focused project aimed at promoting, growing and eating healthy food, and further notes that a team of volunteers will be providing support and mentoring for those wanting to grow their own but lacking basic horticultural skills.
S3M-8183 Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society (lodged on 16 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-8183 Jim Tolson: Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society—That the Parliament congratulates Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society on their successful joint bid to the Postcode Lottery Dream Fund for £65,000 for an edible gardening project; notes that this is a community-focused project aimed at promoting, growing and eating healthy food, and further notes that a team of volunteers will be providing support and mentoring for those wanting to grow their own but lacking basic horticultural skills. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn

S3M-8183 Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh and Scottish Allotments and Gardens Society (lodged on 16 March 2011) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jim Hume*, Rob Gibson*, Robert Brown*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Scanlon*, Nanette Milne*
